tasks.name: Guess the number.
tasks.desc: Your goal is to retrive the flag by reversing the C++ binary file included using you prefered reverse engineering tool/method. There are multiple solutions for this excercise.

tasks.name: Buffer overflow
tasks.desc: Binary exploitation is very similar to the reverse engeneering, however in this case you need to utilize the weakness in C's puts() function to execute a different function than the main called win() that should print out your flag.

tasks.name: Secret Mosaic
tasks.desc: Welcome to the 'Secret Mosaic' visual secret sharing challenge! Are you ready to uncover the hidden secret by decoding a mosaic of images? Sharpen your eyes and dive into the world of visual cryptography. In this challenge, you will be downloading a 'zip' file which contains two images. However, these images hold a hidden secret that can only be revealed through visual secret sharing techniques. Your mission is to decipher the hidden message by combining the individual images in a specific way.

tasks.name: Hidden Secrets
tasks.desc: Welcome to the 'Hidden Secrets' steganography challenge! Are you ready to uncover concealed messages hidden within innocent-looking images? Put your steganography skills to the test and embark on a journey of discovery. In this challenge, you will be presented with an image that appears to be an ordinary picture. However, looks can be deceiving. Your mission is to uncover a secret message hidden within the image using steganography techniques

tasks.name: Ciphered Secrets
tasks.desc: Welcome to the 'Ciphered Secrets' challenge! Prepare yourself to unravel the mysteries concealed within a simple substitution cipher. Engage your cryptographic skills and decode hidden messages using the power of mono-alphabetic substitution. In this challenge, you will encounter encrypted messages that have been transformed using a mono-alphabetic substitution cipher. This cipher involves substituting each letter of the plaintext with a corresponding letter from the cipher alphabet. Your task is to decipher the encrypted messages by uncovering the mapping between the original alphabet and the substituted letters.
